TEXT.TITLE: CHRYSLER <C> TO STEP UP COUNTERFEIT BATTLE
TEXT.BODY: Chrysler Corp said it is escalating its war with automotive parts counterfeiters and will use the service of Light Signatures Inc of Los Angeles. It said computer technology by Light Signatures initially will be used to safeguard warranty glass. Reuter
